name: Explosive Dinosaurs
description: EXPLOSIVE DINOSAURS: PARTY ARCADE with 36 COMPETITIVE FRIENDSHIP DESTROYER MINIGAMES, for up to 4 players.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP+ Processor: Intel Atom Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 400 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Processor: Intel Core i3+ Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GT210 or better DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 400 MB available space
